pacman.model

类 BarObstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
          • pacman.model.BarObstacle
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    直接已知子类:
    GhostBarObstacle

    public class BarObstacle
extends javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
    This class defines a rectangle that only has one unit width and any unit length
    作者:
    Zhangli Wang
    另请参阅:
    Maze

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static javafx.scene.paint.Color obstacleColor
      the color of BarObstacle with an initial value Color.CADETBLUE
      static double THICKNESS
      the unit thickness of a block, "25"

      • 从类继承的字段 javafx.scene.Node

      构造器和说明
      BarObstacle(double x, double y, java.lang.String orientation, double length)
      Initialize a bar obstacle with a certain width THICKNESS and any units of length by the parameter length.

    • 字段详细资料

      • obstacleColor

        public static javafx.scene.paint.Color obstacleColor
        the color of BarObstacle with an initial value Color.CADETBLUE

      • THICKNESS

        public static double THICKNESS

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BarObstacle

        public BarObstacle(double x,
                   double y,
                   java.lang.String orientation,
                   double length)
        Initialize a bar obstacle with a certain width THICKNESS and any units of length by the parameter length.

        The orientation is either "horizontal" or "vertical". The color of the bar obstacle is passed by the static parameter obstacleColor

        参数:
        x - - the index of x in the maze
        y - - the index of y in the maze
        orientation - - "horizontal" or "vertical"
        length - - the length of the bar (1 == 25px)
